General.Name: Daesung Finetec Co.Ltd
General.Description: Daesung Finetec Co.,Ltd. designs, produces, and sells fine blanking and progressive press in South Korea. It offers automobile products, such as brake parts, seat recliners, clutch hub plates, air con disks, door locks, safety belts, and other products, as well as progressive fine blanking metal molds. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Changwon, South Korea.
